pr_title: Avoid duplicates with metadata caching client on iterateStatus

timeline.bodyText: this was a bug which cause two listStatus RPCs on one iterateStatus API call
timeline.author: apc999

timeline.message: Fix metadata caching client on iterateStatus
Fix metadata caching client on iterateStatus

timeline.bodyText: mMetadataCache.put(path, status); is not caching ls result of a dir and it should be status.getPath, not path
timeline.author: apc999
